ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Mesmerisation
ygData.msgSnippet: Yup, It s not true.  The preacher spawned 3 times for us last night and we were all over the room, including on the stage. There was also a Vox raid last
ygData.messageBody:
Yup, It's not true. The preacher spawned 3 times for us last night and we
were all over the room, including on the stage.

There was also a Vox raid last night. That was a lot of fun to listen to
as well. I'm getting exited for the times when I can go join. :)

Thanks also for the advice on Mesmerisation. If I stay back towards the
stage, and the puller pulls to the front of the room I can mezz everything
without getting myself mezzed. Though it was a bit annoying I can't
enthrall while they're all mezzed, but it did get us out of quite a few
sticky situations. I was able to hold everything back while our casters
gated out and our tanks ran to the zone(gotta love having a bard with
invis song in the group, hehe), then zone myself (ugly pull. with all
casters oom and tanks lown on health. bad picture.)

Thanks!!!!
Ezrae

On Mon, 20 Mar 2000, td wrote:

.From: td <tomaaas@...>
.
.I don't think it is true. When we camped him a while
.back, once we cleared the room, we hang out on the
.stage and pulled to it from behind, from the entrance
.and sometimes the hallway. He spawned 4 out of first 5
.times, then not for the next 3, then again. So I
.suspect that it is random.
.
.Arcius
.
.> Rumor has it though in the preacher room if you walk
.> on the stage it will
.> cause the Preacher not to spawn, Is this true? He
.> only spawned twice all
.> day yesterday (and my group was very careful not to
.> walk on the stage.
.> heh). Any truth in this? :)
.
.
